name: OH MY GOD, LOOK AT THIS KNIGHT
description: Grab your shiny helmet and trusty sword, gather all the valor and honor you have, and show everyone, what being the true knight actually means!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Pentium 2.9 Ghz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX 9 compatible video card with shader model 3.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse + Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: Sense of humor and gamepad
